applet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a computer program that is part of a larger program, and which performs a particular job, such as finding documents on the Internet
applet.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a small computer program, for example one that is put onto your computer when you look at a particular WEBSITE on the Internet, and which allows you to use the website to do something
applet.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: You download an applet from the site to make the interactive animations work.
